properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:35PM PST until January 18 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...MORE SNOW OVERNIGHT AND SATURDAY...

.A warm front will move into the region overnight bringing another
round of snow. The east slopes of the Washington Cascades from the
Columbia River Gorge northward will be most impacted.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Kittitas Valley and Yakima Valley.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY
